episodes.title: Cult Expert Dr. Steve Hassan on The Cult of Trump
episodes.description:
Former Moonie Dr. Steven Hassan educates us on mind control, propaganda, the blind devotion of many Trump followers, and what we can do to stay in communication with our loved ones trapped in The Cult of Trump. 

The Cult of Trump: A Leading Cult Expert Explains How the President Uses Mind Control is on Amazon at https://a.co/d/4iA7pPO

Dr. Hassan's website and resources: https://freedomofmind.com/
Dr. Hassan on YouTube: @drstevenhassan
Dr. Hassan on Substack: substack.com/@stevenhassan 
Dr. Hassan on Instagram: @cultexpert

Amy's Book, The Judas Effect: How Evangelicals Betrayed Jesus for Power: https://a.co/d/jehxo85
Amy's Substack: https://substack.com/@UCUnG0qT9pJNt3bfOEhSz6dQ 
Amy on Instagram: @amyhawk, Author

episodes.title: Tia Levings on her journey out of a fundamentalist cult.
episodes.description:
"Keep people before ideas." - Tia Levings is the bestselling author of "A Well-Trained Wife; My Escape from Christian Patriarchy." You might know her from the hit docuseries on Amazon--Shiny Happy People---or the We Can Do Hard Things podcast. In this interview, we discuss the "Biblical" teachings that conditioned Tia for an abusive marriage, and how those same teachings have conditioned white evangelicals in America for an abusive president. We also talk about how she finally escaped her marriage, and Doug Wilson's fundamentalist cult. 

Tia's book: https://a.co/d/15qsbiz
Tia's Substack: What the Fundamentalist?! https://tialevings.substack.com/
Tia's Instagram: @Tialevingswriter
Tia's Website: www.tialevings.com

Amy's book: https://a.co/d/cdPgYbA
Related video: https://youtu.be/OrNZQBsxCoQ?si=qV0SedR7oHsP_lDM

#trumpism #christiannationalism #religiousnationalism #politics #religion #exvangelical #deconstruction #cults #shinyhappypeople #teenmania #dougwilson
